mapper.select: SELECT SEQ AS SEQ , SBTF.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION , SBTF.MODIFIERCODE AS MODIFIERCODE , STARTIP AS STARTIP , ENDIP AS ENDIP , ISLOGIN AS ISLOGIN , ISADMIN AS ISADMIN , TWOFACTOR AS TWOFACTOR , SOD.DOMAINCODE AS COMPANYCODE FROM SYS_BASE_TWO_FACTOR AS SBTF LEFT JOIN SYS_OBJECT_DOMAIN AS SOD ON SBTF.DOMAINID = SOD.DOMAINID WHERE TWOFACTOR = 'Y' AND SEQ = #{seq}
